title: Hochberg Says Phase One Is More Truce Than Deal
itunes:title: Hochberg Says Phase One Is More Truce Than Deal
description:
Former Export-Import Bank President Fred Hochberg discusses his book "Trade Is Not a Four Letter Word." He shares his thoughts on U.S.-China trade negotiations and how everyday products like the taco bowl and the iPhone make the case for the need for a trade deal.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
